nodes.text: Gali was a female individual who was a member of the Altisian Jedi during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Despite not being Force-sensitive, Gali lived and trained with the Altisian Jedi, a Jedi sect that was led by Jedi Master Djinn Altis. During the Clone Wars in 22 BBY, she traveled with the rest of the sect to the planet Yarille, where they carried out relief work.
